text: George Wild (born 1887) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside right. ==Career== Wild spent his early career with Sowerby Bridge Institute and Halifax Town. He signed for Bradford City from Halifax Town in December 1913.Frost, p. 410 He made 2 league appearances for the club,Frost, p. 390 before being released in 1914. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1887 births Category:Date of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Halifax Town A.F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football inside forwards
title: George Wild (footballer)
